extendedInfo.description: This is a plugin of 'Daily Yoga (All-in-One)'.*** This app does not open on its own. ***Please first install the main app 'Daily Yoga (All-in-One)' from Google Play before using this plugin:http://goo.gl/yuDqJor you can download from our homepagehttp://www.dailyyoga.comStanding poses are the foundation of yoga. In this session, you are required to stand all the way in 22 postures, with various bending and balancing ones playing an important role.Have you ever noticed the problems when you're standing? Your legs and feet are weak with strain so that you tend to hunch your back, make your belly protrude, or with most of the weight on just one side of your body. Besides poor posture, such standing habits cause muscular pain, leg length discrepancy, obstructed blood flow and various spinal diseases.Let yoga tell what it's like to stand correctly. This session will strengthen your legs, loosen your muscles, enhance flexibility of your joints and increase balance as well. We apply simple variation not only for people of all levels to enjoy casual yoga stretches after work or before going to bed, also to cover almost all kinds of standing postures which help open your chest, take your shoulders down, stand straight and tall, balance weight equally, align your hips and engage all of your muscles to add flexibility to the whole body.When you are standing, waiting for the bus or in a queue at the check counter, you shall try to stand properly and this will make your moment become so lovely and yogi style. Take yoga into your life, then all the differences will become a pleasant surprise.

reviews.title: Love it!
reviews.comment: Easy to follow. Images makes it easier to understand. Great in galaxy S2.
reviews.author: TheCarolfq

reviews.title: Obsessed
reviews.comment: This app is amazing! It calms your body and mind with simple music and guided meditation. A must have for anyone from a beginner to a master.

reviews.title: I love this Yoga system
reviews.comment: Tried it once, and I already love it. A necessary app for any person who is curious about yoga :-)

reviews.title: Good
reviews.comment: I\'m not too flexible.  You may want to keep a block near you in case you can\'t reach the floor like me during the Triangle pose. I didn\'t have time to grab mine and pausing would have wasted time...  Otherwise, good. :)

reviews.title: Most essential app.
reviews.comment: Most required app for Good health. I started practice &  reduced good amount of excess weight in a month which I could not acheive over years on jim. Flexibility of body increased a lot. It should b adopted in schools, offices, bussiness, establishments & home etc for general good health and disease free families & thereby Nation. Governaments should make strict rule as yoga should be one of d essential as air, water, food and home for better living. Early morning is d best time.
